pr_title: Fix collectionMetadata missing link issue when collection count is 0

timeline.bodyText:
I thought we already send "self" links when I suggested adding this.
Since we don't do that for count >0, the consistent solution would be to return an empty links array when count ==0.
Other option is to add "self" for both cases (at the end when count >0). But this might increase the payload size.
timeline.author: karthikbalasub

replies.bodyText: Yeah, I looked back the ticket, the empty array is the common expectation
replies.author: BrianPin
